escrows.name: Bridge
escrows.categoryReason: Escrow admin (Arbitrum DAO) is controlled by Arbitrum DAO
escrows.description: Main Arbitrum bridge contract holding ETH and other assets.

escrows.name: Old Bridge (Historical)
escrows.categoryReason: Escrow admin (Arbitrum DAO) is controlled by Arbitrum DAO
escrows.description: Historical bridge escrow, still holds some ETH.

escrows.name: Custom ERC20 Gateway
escrows.categoryReason: Escrow admin (Arbitrum DAO) is controlled by Arbitrum DAO
escrows.description: Main entry point for users depositing ERC20 tokens that require minting custom tokens on L2.

escrows.name: Standard ERC20 Gateway
escrows.categoryReason: Escrow admin (Arbitrum DAO) is controlled by Arbitrum DAO
escrows.description: Main entry point for users depositing ERC20 tokens. Upon depositing, on L2 a generic, "wrapped" token will be minted.

escrows.name: Maker/Sky DAI Vault
escrows.categoryReason: Escrow admin (MakerDAO) matches token issuer(s), uses canonical messaging
escrows.description: Maker/Sky-controlled vault for DAI, USDS and sUSDS bridged with canonical messaging.

escrows.name: Lido wstETH Vault
escrows.categoryReason: Escrow admin (Lido DAO) matches token issuer(s), uses canonical messaging
escrows.description: wstETH Vault for custom wstETH Gateway. Fully controlled by Lido governance.

escrows.name: Livepeer LPT Vault
escrows.categoryReason: Escrow controlled by Livepeer (token issuer), uses canonical messaging
escrows.description: LPT Vault for custom Livepeer Token Gateway.

escrows.name: Native USDC (Circle CCTP)
escrows.categoryReason: Circle controls both USDC token AND the CCTP attestation service. True issuer control.
escrows.description: Native USDC minted directly on Arbitrum by Circle via Cross-Chain Transfer Protocol. Circle controls the attestation service.

escrows.name: USDT0 (Layer Zero OFT)
escrows.categoryReason: Trust LayerZero Labs (3-of-5 multisig) + Everdawn Labs DVN. Tether does not directly control the bridge.
escrows.description: USDT0 on Arbitrum via Layer Zero OFT. Validated by LayerZero DVN + Everdawn Labs DVN.

externalTokens.name: Savings USDS
externalTokens.categoryReason: Token bridged via Custom escrow. Trust model not fully analyzed.

trustedParties.name: Custom escrow Operator
trustedParties.riskDescription: Custom escrow controls message validation and token minting
